name: Proof_368 — Cooking Pork for Two Meals (Midday & Evening) MaMeeFarm | DGCP™
description:
This proof documents a daily food preparation activity at MaMeeFarm, recorded on
21 December 2025 at 12:23 PM (GMT+7).

The image shows pork being cooked in a simple outdoor kitchen setting. The meat is intentionally divided and prepared to serve two meals—lunch and dinner—maximizing limited resources through careful planning and labor.

This moment reflects a core reality of small-scale rural life:
one purchase → multiple meals → sustained energy for work.

There is no surplus, no waste, and no automation. Cooking is performed manually using basic tools and locally available ingredients. The process represents not only food preparation but also resource optimization under constrained conditions.

Within the DGCP framework, this proof captures human decision-making around consumption, labor continuity, and survival efficiency. The act of cooking is inseparable from the ability to continue farm work and daily responsibilities.

The image is recorded as-is, with a visible embedded timestamp, ensuring temporal accuracy and traceability within the MaMeeFarm DGCP archive.

This proof is prepared for minting as part of the DGCP MaMeeFarm DATA collection on OpenSea.
